TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV6Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) Internet 控制消息协议的统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for Internet Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV6 是一组错误和信息性消息，可与 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 一起使用。ICMPV6 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). 方法使用此类 来返回 ICMPV6 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPV6 traffic information. 此类中的属性与在 IETF RFC 2466 中定义的 ICMPv6 的管理信息基对象相关联。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for ICMPv6 defined in IETF RFC 2466. 在 RFC 2463 中定义了 ICMPv6。ICMPv6 is defined in RFC 2463. ## Examples 下面的示例显示当前 ICMPv6 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只能由派生自的类调用 。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定接收的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于以下任何原因，可以将无法访问目标的消息发送到作为数据包源的计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机找不到目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 以管理员身份禁止与目标地址进行通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙禁止将数据包传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包协议的侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于以下任何原因，可以将无法访问目标的消息发送到作为数据包源的计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机找不到目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 以管理员身份禁止与目标地址进行通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙禁止将数据包传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包协议的侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 回送答复消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Echo Reply messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 回送答复”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回显请求和回显回复消息允许计算机从网络上的远程计算机请求 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MembershipQueriesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 组管理协议 (IGMP) 组成员查询消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Group management Protocol (IGMP) Group Membership Query messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的组成员查询消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Query messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播路由器发送组成员身份查询消息，以了解哪些组在各自连接的物理网络上拥有成员。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 主机计算机通过为主机联接的每个多播组发送组成员身份报告来响应组成员查询消息。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 当主机加入新的多播组时，它还可以发送组成员身份报告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 当主机离开多播组时，将发送组成员身份缩减消息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesSent { long get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送 ICMPv6 消息以传达有关使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的错误和信息。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long MessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送 ICMPv6 消息以传达有关使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的错误和信息。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 邻居广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是一种进程，其中主机计算机和路由器可以确定已知驻留在共享链接上的邻居地址。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现过程的一部分是使用称为 "邻居请求" 和 "邻居播发" 的 ICMP 消息来完成的。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 发送邻居请求消息以发现邻居的链路层地址，或通过缓存的链路层地址验证邻居是否仍可访问。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含地址信息的邻居播发将在响应请求时发送或宣布地址更改。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsSent As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定发送的邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Neighbor Advertisement messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是一种进程，其中主机计算机和路由器可以确定已知驻留在共享链接上的邻居地址。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现过程的一部分是使用称为 "邻居请求" 和 "邻居播发" 的 ICMP 消息来完成的。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 发送邻居请求消息以发现邻居的链路层地址，或通过缓存的链路层地址验证邻居是否仍可访问。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含地址信息的邻居播发将在响应请求时发送或宣布地址更改。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketTooBigMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long PacketTooBigMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 数据包太大消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Packet Too Big messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 数据包太大消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Packet Too Big messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据包无法转发时，路由器将发送 "数据包太大" 消息，因为此数据包大于传出链接 (MTU) 的最大传输单元数。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据包无法转发时，路由器将发送 "数据包太大" 消息，因为此数据包大于传出链接 (MTU) 的最大传输单元数。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当主机计算机或路由器在处理数据包标头的内容时遇到问题（例如，遇到无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一标头类型）时，将发送参数问题消息。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering a invalid IPv6 option or a invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsSent As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当主机计算机或路由器在处理数据包标头的内容时遇到问题（例如，遇到无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一标头类型）时，将发送参数问题消息。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv6 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 重定向消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Redirect messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 重定向”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重定向消息由路由器发送，通知主机具有更好的目标地址路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RouterAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 路由器广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的路由器广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主计算机可以在其直接连接的子网之外发送 IP 数据报之前，必须在该子网中发现至少一个路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 此发现可以使用称为路由器播发和路由器请求的 ICMP 消息完成。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 路由器会定期发送一条播发消息，以通告其状态和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络而不是等待接收路由器播发时，它可以发送路由器请求来请求路由器立即发送其播发。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages sent.

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Solicitation messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的路由器请求消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Solicitation messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主计算机可以在其直接连接的子网之外发送 IP 数据报之前，必须在该子网中发现至少一个路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 此发现可以使用称为路由器播发和路由器请求的 ICMP 消息完成。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 路由器会定期发送一条播发消息，以通告其状态和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络而不是等待接收路由器播发时，它可以发送路由器请求来请求路由器立即发送其播发。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制决定在被丢弃之前可以转发多少次。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点限制值将减少1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制达到0时，或者当路由器接收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，数据包将被丢弃，数据包的源将收到一条超时消息，指示初始跃点限制太小或数据包被路由循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制决定在被丢弃之前可以转发多少次。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点限制值将减少1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制达到0时，或者当路由器接收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，数据包将被丢弃，数据包的源将收到一条超时消息，指示初始跃点限制太小或数据包被路由循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]
